Row.Text: Mountain tiles can be worked for [icon:YIELD_FOOD]Food, and Fürstabtei (Abby) grants them addtional [icon:YIELD_CULTURE]Culture.s

[LIST][LI]Mountain tiles can be worked for [icon:YIELD_FOOD]Food, and Fürstabtei (Abby) grants them addtional [icon:YIELD_CULTURE]Culture.[LI]Gain [B]1 Point [/B]toward the [B]Non Sufficit Orbis Legacy Path [/B] when Allied to at least 1 civilization for all [B]conquered Settlements[/B].[LI][B]+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production [/B]towards constructing the [B]Zytglogge (Clock Tower)[/B].[/LIST]
+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production from being the Swiss Confederacy's associated Wonder.
